segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the chaos unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe she’s focused only on that plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss the sound of water splashing on the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are climbing and reaching, all while she remains blissfully oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s frustrating to watch, like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility of the garden outside only adds to the strangeness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her before something goes really wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
